products.name: ICTICT532 - Apply IP, ethics and privacy in ICT environments
products.description: Learn to apply intellectual property, ethics and privacy principles in ICT environments. Includes data protection, privacy regulations and professional ethics guidelines.

products.name: ICTICT517 - Match ICT needs with the strategic direction of the organisation
products.description: Align ICT requirements with organizational strategic direction. Includes needs analysis, strategic planning and resource optimization.

products.name: ICTICT523 - Gather data to identify business requirements
products.description: Collect data to identify business requirements. Includes requirements analysis, data collection methods and business requirements documentation.

products.name: ICTICT524 - Determine ICT strategies and solutions for organisations
products.description: Determine ICT strategies and solutions for organizations. Includes strategic planning, technology assessment and solution design.

products.name: ICTICT526 - Verify client business requirements
products.description: Verify client business requirements. Includes requirements validation, client communication and documentation confirmation.
